one particular day , i had done about 2 weeks worth of shopping and went to the register to pay for it .
i reached into my back right pocket and noticed there was no money in there .
i started to get nervous .
my pocketbook was in the car
and i was sure i had put the money in my back right pocket .
i looked at the cashier , not knowing what to do .
there were people behind me in line
and i immediately thought of my pocketbook in the car with the money intended to pay this month 's rent .
the cashier told me to visit the courtesy counter .
i laughed .
" but it was in cash , no one would hand that in ! "
i decided there was no harm in checking , so i walked up to the woman behind the counter and said " i have to ask , did anyone turn in cash by any chance ? "
she asked , " how much ? "
my face then lit up . "
$ 200 in the form on 20 dollar bills . "
" actually yes , someone did !
" i was surprised .
" who was it ?
i want to thank them . "
